attributes.action: get back to basics and listen to the people
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we are all sick to the back teeth of high prices,but it is an insult to the ENGLISH people when you have ghost staff wages, foreigners getting more than the taxpayer, pensioners struggling. we would like to see all the polotitions feed clothe and house their families on £290.00 per week in the real world .Give your polititions barracks instead of these extravagant homes.Let us see that you care lets put the great back into britain instead of britain being great for immigrants,

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
